TopicTitle: How do I make an EVA seat?

Articles.Content:
I realized that this is not as easy as it seems, I used an armchair model that Rareden gave me (yes, I have his permission), and looked at the EAS-1 .cfg file to see what the part module is supposed to be like, but it doesn't even show up in the parts tab. Please help...

Edited June 18, 2013 by POTKC
